content: working in rounds 20 k to end of sole needle stop bor is now the first stitch on the instep needle ankle 21 k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k4 repeat 6 7 8 times more k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through on 2nd needle k4 k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling copyright 2011 by dena stelly www littlemonkeysstitchnspin com through three times k4 m1r wrapping needle twice before pulling through 1 2 3 times k4 k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through three times k4 22 slip next stitch dropping second wrap off the needle k4 repeat around 23 sl1 k4 repeat around 24 repeat round 23 25 k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k4 repeat around repeat rounds 22-25 until sock is about 1 from desired height ending after a repeat of round 24 cuff 26 k2tog* p2 k1 repeat around *note knitting slipped stitch together with next knit st 27 k1 p2 k1 repeat around repeat round 27 for approximately 1 bind off loosely i prefer jeny s stretchy bind off for toe-up socks http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php copyright 2011 by dena stelly www littlemonkeysstitchnspin com
